contest-event.event-date: Feb. 4, 1979 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Triumphant Rhapsody Bowburn Community Centre, County Durham Prizes - 1st £30 and trophy, 2,d £20 and cup, 3rd £15 and trophy. 6 bands competed.
